turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Plus (telecommunications Poland).
turn.1: What is known about the company Plus in Poland?
turn.2: Plus (telecommunications Poland) Plus (formerly Plus GSM) is the brand name of Poland's mobile phone network operator, Polkomtel.
turn.4: The company is entirely owned by Polkomtel sp. z o.o.
turn.5: What services does the company provide?
turn.6: It operates GSM (900/1800 MHz), UMTS, LTE and WLAN networks in Poland.
turn.9: How many customers does the company have?
turn.10: At the end of 2011, Plus had 13,698 million customers, including 6,576 million (47%) in prepaid system.
turn.12: In July 2011, Zygmunt Solorz-Żak agreed to buy Polkomtel SA for 15.1 billion zlotys ($5.5 billion).
